ValidationRule.description: Recruiter cannot change ownership of prospect records unless they are owned by Every Special Child. Recruiters are allowed to give ownership of their records to ESC.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && NOT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) = '005Hr00000H00ea' || (OwnerId) = '005Hr00000H00ea') && NOT( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator' || $Profile.Name = 'Data Team' || $UserRole.Name = 'Recruiting Manager' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change ownership for this Prospect unless you are the current owner or part of the Data Team/Admin group.
